review_text: The house was perfect for our vacation. The beach was walkable and soo pretty. The house was spacious so we could all spread out.
Amazing views and beach is a very short walk away! Home was very clean and spacious!

The Coastal Cove house was just great. It was exactly as pictured, and was a clean, relaxing and welcoming space. The view of the ocean from the sunroom was amazing. The house was perfectly situated for our travel itinerary -- close to both the coast and the redwoods. Zoe was very responsive to questions, and provided lots of information about the area. Check in and check out were both very simple. We were delighted with this place and would definitely stay here again.
Beautiful house with an amazing view I loved it
The house was very clean and comfortable, situated in a great location, but the view was priceless. We would love to come back.
Awesome location, conveniently located to grocery and the Redwoods. Would definitely stay there again.
A beautiful space with a spectacular view!

Pretty decent stay but the stellar view is currently partially obstructed by a large pile of dirt which was disappointing.
Other than that everything is as listed and it‚Äôs an easy walk to the beach.

PROS: Plenty of towels and washcloths for 6 people. Towels & sheets were soft & beds were comfortable. The bathroom & floors were very clean. Plenty of room for 6. Crockpot in kitchen was nice to start meals before long days in Redwoods. Enough dishes for 6. Good view and easy beach access. Beach was great for agate hunting. Had Disney & other tv options.
CONS: There were a few crumbs on the counters & tables and in cabinets. Overall, the house felt very clean besides this. The tools/pans in the kitchen could use upgrades. The knives were dull. The view wasn't quite as expected because there was a large, 5' high and 15' wide, pile of mulch about 10' in front of the house. Was still a nice view but couldn't get a photo without the mulch. The de-humidifier had to run all night or there was excess moisture & pooling on the windows. Trundle is in front room with dehumidifier. Telescope doesn't work.
Despite these minor items we loved the stay & would love to stay again!
Booked this as a last minute stop on our west coast road trip and we are so glad that we did. The place was perfect, so spacious and so welcoming. If you get the chance you must make a booking üòÄ
Overall stay is awesome.!
Great view and great rock hunting Beach. Beds are comfortable, and property manager got us some wine glasses when we discovered there were none.

This was a beautiful stay. We couldn't have asked for a better veiw, and it was close to everything you could need. The street is a little tricky to find, but once you know what you're looking for it was fine!

Beautiful home with beautiful views! Easy walk across the street where we collected sea glass while walking along the beach. So many things to do from the Redwoods to the beach. Perfect place! Zoe was very helpful and fast to respond to any questions we had.

Amazing view of the beach every day, sleeping in the sun room with the moon and stars. Steps to the beach and very spacious inside. Very nice spot and love to go back. Make sure to bring some cooking items if you plan to cook, no basics such as oil or pepper, but plenty of cookware and dishes/utensils.

Zoe was a very helpful and friendly host and the place was perfect for our stay as we drove from there to hikes in the Redwoods, walked to play on the beach, and ate at the local brewery. We had a wonderful stay and would recommend this place for anyone coming to this area.

We had a nice weekend at the beach and hiking in the Redwoods. We loved the view and there were plenty of warm towels for our party of 6. Zoe had great recommendations of places to eat. We enjoyed the food from SeaQuake Brewing.
We had to bring the trundle mattress into the living room for our 9 and 6 yr olds as we arrived in the middle of the night and it was too cold even with the space heater for them to sleep in the front room. They loved playing Jenga on the coffee table.
The master bedroom bed was comfortable with plenty of pillows.
We had a wonderful time. The house is beautiful and roomy. Lots of light
Second time I‚Äôve stayed here and it‚Äôs a perfect fit. Thanks so much.
This was our second time staying here, and we love it. Great view through the windows and the place is clean, modern, and comfortable.
Clean and amazing views!
Beautiful view from windows! Clean place. Lots of room to move . Gorgeous kitchen.
Prefect location for a beautiful view. No issues whatsoever. I would definitely book again.

Coastal cove was a great home base for our Redwoods exploration. Gorgeous views of the ocean, plenty of room to spread out, relax after a busy day and plan our next days adventures. Small details were all there like board games for the kids and syrup in the pantry. Crescent City was a great city to stay in, and Zoe left great recommendations for food, activities, and trails. Wonderful all around.

Coastal Cove was exactly what we wanted! A clean, spacious, and close to beach rental.
The kitchen is awesome and shower hot with great water pressure.
Just an amazing experience from start to finish.

This place was exactly as described. We stayed for a week and took time to explore the nearby state and national parks and the coast. The sunroom was the best spot in the house. The views were gorgeous and a perfect spot to watch the sunset. A space heater was provided for chilly October mornings/evenings and a spacious daybed to enjoy the view.
The house was stocked with much more than a typical airbnb- coffee and filters were provided, more than enough towels, a closet with extra blankets, a basket of snacks, laundry detergent, dryer sheets, shampoo, and conditioner. We ended up not needing to purchase nearly as much as we normally would.
The neighborhood is super quiet and it‚Äôs only steps to the beach where you can explore the tide pools at low tide, watch the surfers, collect rocks, etc.
The house was very clean, well stocked, and really spacious. If you are looking for a home base to do some hiking and exploring along the coast, this is a beautiful and relaxing spot!
Zoe's place was great. Amazing views of the ocean and beach just as advertised. The house was very clean and had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable.

Loved this place! Beautiful view and we loved the close beach access. The town was just a couple of minutes away. We were happy to find that we were 7 minutes away from Safeway and Walmart. Lots of random helpful things in the house like extension cords and HDMI cords. The washer and dryer were great as well.

This place was exactly what we were looking for. Great distance from the Redwoods and the Beach was an added bonus. Zoe provided great recommendations for hiking and food and was quick to respond. Thanks Zoe! We hope to be back soon.
Amazing views and great host!

Great home with spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean and close to all the attractions that draw you to the area. Quiet and clean with very easy checkin instructions.
Would definitely stay here again if we are in the area.
Great spot! Clean with great sunset views. Highly recommend
Lovely home and wonderful location! Had everything we needed and was exactly as described.
Absolutely beautiful views of sunrise and sunset! You can watch it from the sunroom or primary bedroom as well. Great central location for going to Harris Beach, Samuel H. Boardman & Redwoods!
We had a wonderful stay. The view was breathtaking.
fantastic views, easy walk to beach with two kids, comfortable and functional space. will definitely book again.

This was such a nice and peaceful stay. We loved having a clear and perfect view of the sunset from the sunroom every afternoon. If you‚Äôre looking for a place close to the beach, this is the perfect spot.
Excellent location. Beautiful view. Great home beach walk and sunsets.
Easy access to the beach and great view of the ocean from the house!

This is a fun beachy themed rental. everything is as listed. We had a great time being just a short walk from the beach. There is a wire fence that is quite tall that crosses the front yard so people don't cut through the neighbors yard. I hope this is new and can be replaced with something like a white Pickett fence so that it doesn't cross through your line of vision of the beach from the front sunroom area.
Great view! stocked kitchen. Large common spaces. Had trouble finding it, but otherwise everything we needed. Thanks for the binder with info!
Very spacious home, perfect for families. Fantastic view from the house. Very peaceful. Zoe was a great host, very responsive and informative. We loved this stop in our road trip.

Location was beautiful. Nice view from the seating area. The unit was well stocked and overall comfortable. It was very warm our first night and we could have used some fans because a lot of the windows don‚Äôt open. Overall would recommend when you are in the area!
Fantastic views perfect location. The best
Would stay again!

Our family had an amazing stay! Walking on the beach in the morning when the tide was low was a favorite for everyone as there were many places to explore for critters. Watching the sunset from the beach was amazing as well!
We were all very comfortable and slept well especially after heading to the redwoods which was only a 10-15 minute drive. There were many great trails and a river to play in. Would definitely recommend this location if you‚Äôre looking for a view and a decent price.

Immaculate, spectacular, hidden gem are all words I'd use to describe this slice of heaven. Beautifully situated near so many attractions. We enjoyed both the beach, and the redwoods during our stay. 10/10

There‚Äôs a map inside the house, and it‚Äôs only about a 5 minute walk, but it would have been nice to have that info available before check in.
We had a great stay. The view was gorgeous and it was exactly as described. We would stay here again!
this is not the first time I've stayed at Zoe's Beach home and I am hoping it is not the last. gorgeous views. tons of space and it just makes you feel like you're at home.
Great views and wonderful house! We found everything we needed.
It was a nice home close to the beach!
The view and location were excellent.
Great stay! Beautiful view of the ocean
This was the perfect spot for our visit to Crescent City. The house was comfortable and the kitchen was stocked. The view out the windows was amazing!

This place was so comfortable and so clean. The view was spectacular and we loved watching the sunsets! There were great suggestions for eating out‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ we especially enjoyed the brewery. It was just perfect for our getaway to the Redwoods!!
An amazing location and view from the house.
This place was amazing, easy access to the beach and amazing views exactly how the pictures showed it. We felt very lucky to have this peaceful great home with such a wonderful view!
What a view! Very nice home with a great view. We enjoyed walking the beach. Would definitely go back and stay again.
This is just a really really great stay all around. Well put together, peaceful vibe, and great views. The kind of place you don‚Äôt want to leave.
Awesome rental in an excellent location. We travel often and highly recommend this place!
Quiet neighborhood and impressive views. Having kids, I appreciated the beach toys in the garage and the board games in the living quarters.
Great stay! Beautiful view from the sunroom and a quiet neighborhood, will be back!
What a great property! The ocean is *right there* and Zoe is so easy to work with. She is responsive and kind. We‚Äôre very glad we stayed at Coastal Cove!
Fantastic place. Very clean. The view is unmatchable, especially with a subset. Short walk over to the beach. The front room was a great place to wind down after exploring the Redwoods.
Loved every moment of it!! Beautiful!! the welcome binder was so detailed and appreciated.
Great space for a weekend getaway.

We loved this cozy bungalow for a 3 night stay with our family of 5 in Crescent City. The clean and comfortable rooms and amenities such as the two smart TVs and kitchen appliances made up for the age of the home being a bit older.
We loved the sunroom! Upon waking in we were blown away by the amazing view and proximity to the beach. Such a great location close to everything but still feels private enough to feel ‚Äúat home.‚Äù

This place is perfect for families (I even noticed the pop up crib in the primary bedroom.) Nice touches without being over the top!

Zoe was great! Prompt responses and clear communications! House was really nice in a beautiful location with easy access to the Pacific Ocean across the street. Tide pools at low tide were great to check out! Very nice kitchen, comfortable beds and furniture, easy parking on site, and a beautiful ocean view from a great enclosed porch!

There isn‚Äôt beach access from the front yard like in the photos. There is a gate up so you have to walk over to the street. It isn‚Äôt a huge deal, but it was longer than expected. Our stay was great at Zoe's place. The view was wonderful! When the sun hits the sunroom, the room warms up nicely. The kitchen had everything we needed for cooking.

The house definitely has its quirks, like light switches to rooms being located outside the room or wall heaters without numeric thermostats. We also couldn't locate a tub stopper for our daughter to take a bath. No issues though that we couldn't figure out.
We love the view and easy access to Pebble Beach
Amazing view. Zoe very quick to respond. Fun house, great kitchen!
We stayed a long weekend here. The house was very clean and comfortable. The view cannot be beat.
Nice house, very clean‚Ä¶. Very homey with a beautiful view. Great neighborhood- quiet and peaceful! Great host! Felt right at home.

A friend of mine and I reserved Zoe's house so we could attend my daughters baby shower. When we arrived in Crescent City it happened to be a beautiful sunny day. no wind, no clouds. When we walked in the house and saw the views of the ocean, our jaws dropped! the pictures on Airbnb are good but they did not do this view that we were witnessing justice!!! They were spectacular!!! The house was very clean and spacious and open to the kitchen. We had everything we needed for our weekend stay. Zoe was great to work with and very responsive. Beautiful views and great location! Spacious and comfortable place. We enjoyed our stay!

Very disappointed the fireplace did not work. Could not share photos over Smart TV cause it was in bedroom, the TV in living room just has Netflix. Also telescope decorative only! I would have chosen a different place had I known the fireplace was non-functional. Zoe did give me a rebate but only $115. On the positive side, house is large, open & comfy with great kitchen & lots of towels, linens etc. Lots of family games was also very nice. Wifi worked well. Zoe was kind to permit an early check-in & was always positive, quick & kind in her responses. I would stay again at the same price but only if fireplace worked.
We really enjoyed our stay, and hope to come back to this place again !
Very well-equipped home with a beautiful view. It was great to be just a block away from Pebble Beach.
Good View.
Cozy and comfy. We enjoyed our stay. Would recommend!
Beautiful place. Exactly like pictures. Peaceful. Even forgot a sweatshirt and she had it mailed back to my friend. Very helpful and responsive!
We had an amazing stay at this property! The view and location are perfect! The home was very clean and everything we could ask for! Definitely recommend!
beautiful place
Clean with everything you need. Crescent City is a ton of fun. The beach across the street is accessible and beautiful.
The house is great!!! The view and access to the beach are perfect. We will definitely book this one again.
Spacious house, only a few mins from downtown Crescent City. Right on the beach with a great view of the water. Great kitchen and comfortable living room.

I had a wonderful stay at Zoe‚Äòs place. It‚Äôs very spacious and my favorite place was in the front room on the coziest day bed! The view and sounds of crashing waves can‚Äôt be beat. Was remodeled and very clean. The only issue was the construction equipment parked in front of house by the road. But it really didn‚Äôt obstruct the view much because the house sits up on a hill. Deer came right up to the sun porch windows right before dusk as we were watching the sun set!

Outstanding view and location. Zoe was very responsive and check in was seamless. It was an added bonus having access to laundry facilities. We found the amenities to be sparse for the rate we were paying.

Zoe‚Äôs place was perfect! So close to the redwoods, the beach, and close to a Walmart for everything you need!
Zoe was responsive and helpful! I would stay here again!

Views views views!!!!! Amazing house, large and pristine. How everything you needed . Would stay again.

Great communication and the house was exactly as advertised. Great view of the ocean and a quick walk to a wonderful beach. House was clean and had plenty of entertainment for our family. Will be coming back in the future for sure!

We found the location of this place to be the best anyone could want. Views and the beach across the street were almost perfect. The coastal cove bungalow was clean and well supplied. We appreciated the garage and driveway for parking in the back of the house.
We were disappointed when we arrived...parked in front of this beautiful view was a crane and cement mixer. The photo did not show these. Apparently they belonged to another person that owned the land in front of the cottage.
Stunning ocean view & quick walk to beach

Beautiful view and location. Our kids loved walking the beach first thing in the morning. Found starfish in the tide pools and tons of crabs! The house had everything our family of 6 needed! Would definitely recommend!

Had a wonderful stay here! Access to the ocean was so easy, and the views were stunning. Rooms were all very clean, and was so helpful to have both an outside hose to wash off sandy feet and a washing machine/dryer!
Great house. Wish we had more than a day there. Very spacious and comfortable.
What a nice place, so much room. The sunroom was a great place to hang out to watch the sunset and surfers. So close to the Redwood State and National Parks.
Wonderful place right across from the beach. House was well-equipped and very clean. Thank you!
Highly recommended

Stunning view! And...that's coming from someone who lives on Bainbridge Island right on Puget Sound with views of downtown Seattle and Mt. Ranier. Well-appointed, comfortable, and quiet. Just what we needed on our last night before heading home. Highly recommended.
Nice view of ocean from closed in back porch. Easy walk to beach. Easy check in and check out.

This place was just perfect for our Redwood road trip. It was on the beach so the kids were able to play and the sunsets were amazing. Lots of room and quiet neighborhood. Thanks Zoe! we will certainly be back.

This home is the perfect place for beach lovers of any age. View from the sunroom is amazing in any weather. Just a short walk down the hill & across the street and your feet can be in the sand! Comfortable for the family to be together, but with room to spread out also. I almost don't want to share this beach treasure because I hope to return myself again soon & would be heartbroken if it' unavailable.
We loved staying in the house. The view was amazing. We also loved being able to walk across the street to the beach. We would definitely stay here again.

This was a wonderful place for our large family to stay as we visited the Redwoods and the beach. The home is as spacious as the pictures look and very well equipped. Wonderful! 5 Star!

Like I said earlier. Two bedrooms: King size bed in one room, a double bed and single bed in the other room. When you enter the house, you are hit with an outstanding view of the ocean. Amazing view. Great place, very clean.
Amazing views and great location. Would definitely recommend this rental to anyone looking to stay in this area.

Great location and the house is very well maintained. Zoe and Natahna confirmed our booking at last minute and ensured we had a pleasant stay! Beach is right across the street and the ocean view from extended deck is great!

Amazing views of Castle Rock National Wildlife Refuge and the ever-changing weather of Northern CA in this comfortable, clean and well-equipped home. Definitely worth it
Absolutely amazing house, the view of the ocean is great. You just cross the street and you are on a beach. The house has open floor plan and is comfortable
Great place and convenient to all the Redwood Coast has to offer.

Great place to unwind after a few days of road-tripping! The closed-in deck was perfect for sunset drinks and hearing the waves.

wonderful place to stay

Pros: beautiful location, easy check-in, house was clean and as described, we enjoyed our time seeing the redwoods!
Cons: communication with host and emergency preparedness. The power went out in the town while we were there. We had two small children with us and were unsure how long power would remain out. The house had one flashlight available and the batteries were dead. After the host said they would update us on when to expect power on, they stopped responding. We eventually were able to get ahold of them by calling air bnb. They consented to us manually opening the garage door to try to go out ourselves to buy another flashlight or lantern, etc. Hours later, after we purchased our own working flashlight, they called and offered to bring replacement batteries. It was very stressful to try to prepare for a night without heat or power in a town we aren‚Äôt familiar with, and having more basic emergency supplies and more communication from our host would have helped improve our overall experience immensely.

I would highly recommend staying here. You won't be disappointed!
Check in was very simple. The home is very clean, comfortable and accommodating. It‚Äôs a great house with privacy and perfect Pebble Beach sunsets.

fantastic view from the windows from living room and master bedroom. frog's at night were nice along with the waves. close to all convenience's. had great time with family. would definitely recommend.

wow! What an amazing space, view, and host. It's hard to beat waking up to the ocean in your front window. Zoe was so helpful and accommodating. My only complaint is that I couldn't stay longer. I loved it and would recommend this place to anyone and everyone! Thank you, thank you!

What a wonderful place to stay. We brought our four teenagers and enjoyed the roominess of this beach house, and all of the comforts. We can‚Äôt imagine a more beautiful view of the ocean than you get from this home. We are already talking about booking another stay.

Google maps is a little off, pictured the house next door, but the house is as exactly as pictured when you find it. Actually it was better than expected. Great location.
This place was awesome. views were spectacular and was very accommodating. I would love to stay here again if I'm in the area.
